website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for bleaching beginners who only want highlights or ombré hair.
pros: An inexpensive kit that contains everything you need – developer, gloves, bowl, cap and brush
cons: If you want to lighten your entire head of hair, you'll need two to four boxes

customer_reviews.title: Effective on dyed hair. Need more than 1
customer_reviews.text: I had dyed black hair and have been trying different bleaches every couple weeks to get it back to blonde, this is the first one that really worked. Of course it is more orange but thats with any bleach. This product is to prep not to color. I have short thick hair and still needed 3 boxes, so definitely order more just in case. The product did not seem to mix well and stayed clumpy for me but that didnt change the outcome. I left it on for 30 mins and my hair is not damaged or too dry.
customer_reviews.author: cpubradley

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Use on the tips of my hair and i only leave it for 20 minutes max. Deep condition the absolute sh*t out of my hair after took 2 tries to make my tips the color I desired. Spaced out the process
customer_reviews.author: CelesteTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: trust me you will be way better off buying powder blue
customer_reviews.text: Only okay for first timers because it has everything you need. If you want to go platinum blonde or any vivids from black, trust me you will be way better off buying powder blue, 20 vol developer and the mixing kit from diane separately. Healthier, and it will also last you a lot longer. This is only good for one use. Separately will last you 4-12 bleaches depending on what you're doing and hair length.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Green

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty amazing. It won't let me add multiple pictures but my hair was dark brown before with some teal in it and I added a picture of after one bleaching for less than an hour. Maybe like 45 minutes. I wasn't going for white blonde I just wanted to lighten my hair so I could dye it blue and the dye took wonderfully. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I was in a Panic....but now Im very happy with this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Good Stuff! I'm a guy so i was just a bit panicked, but, i did it once for only 8 minutes....then i washed it out....i noticed it didnt go as light as i wanted, so i did it *again* for 20 minutes......and yay....its white. Love it. this was the first time i ever bleached my hair, so i will continue using Manic Panic's products!
customer_reviews.author: HotLanta2017

customer_reviews.title: Great First Time Bleaching  Experience
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I cannot believe how awesome this kit is. I was really impressed with the bleach and the very helpful instructions inside. I am not a hairstylist nor have I gone to school for hair and this was such a user friendly kit. It lightened my dark brown (almost black) hair almost damage free in 25 min. I was able to dye it twice in one day (not recommended but I did it anyways) and I was able to get it to a yellow. I highly recommend you using this kit over anything else I have tried. What a money saver
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Just do it girl
customer_reviews.text: OK let’s be honest we’re all going a little crazy during this quarantine. So I decided to teach myself how to do my own highlights since salons are closed. It actually turned out pretty well. This has a very high volume developer so be sure that you check your hair often as the bleach works extremely fast. I actually really love this and will probably be saving myself a lot of money in the future by touching up my own highlights. Yay me and yay this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on dark brown hair as says
customer_reviews.text: My hair is dark brown and I’ve treat d my hair twice with this product, and it only lifted the shade 1 level. Doesn’t even get warm when working on hair (meaning it’s working) and so basically I have to go to a store or a few just to get a hair product that works (probably two times less price) and workshop 5 times better....I wish i could send this back and get a refund but of course I had to open the package, I’m going to try.
customer_reviews.author: Des Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product was pretty good. It was easy to use and the instructions were simple to understand. My mom and I were going to bleach and dye the underside of our hair. I have very thick black hair and my mom had thin light/dark brown hair. It lightened my mom’s hair after maybe 20ish minutes. Mine took a little longer, I left it in a for maybe 30-40 minutes. And only parts of my hair were lightened to my liking. I was scared to leave it in for longer because I didn’t want my hair to fall out. However, it did lighten my hair and I’m happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza Rios

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Black/dark brown hair
customer_reviews.text: I put coconut oil on hair for 24 hours gave myself a half inch trim and then did the manic panic 40 volume bleach for 25 minutes!! It has lightened my hair atleast 3 shades lighter!! I used olaplex no.3 after for damage. In past year I have dyed hair, balayaged hair, dyed purple then dyed back to dark brown before this! I am very happy with results.. i just needed to lighten hair so my burgundy dye looked brighter!
customer_reviews.author: Vchampagne

customer_reviews.title: Total junk , waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve Ben looking for a few days now for a item to lighten my hair . I’ve tried a few things and hadn’t been successful. I bought this as its to lighten dark hair including black this is what I says I think description anyway . It’s total junk , my hairs a darkish brown and I followed the instructions to T and left it I over 40 minutes and was total crap it didn’t work it’s not lightened my dark hair only lightened a few roots . What’ve waste of money and now I’ve added bleach to my head for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using manic panic lightener and I absolutely love it. I have natural dark brunette hair but use box dye to cover graying roots. I used Splat bleach back in the day and it completely ruined my hair. I swore I'd never bleach my hair again, but after a break up, I needed to switch it up. This formula mixes well and spreads over the hair evenly. If I had been lightening my entire head of hair I would have bought two boxes, but this was plenty for DIY underlights. I will be using this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Tea

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product did bleach my hair, although in the mixing process there were still hard crumbs that did not want to mix along with the solution no matter how hard I tried. It is a thicker bleach formula so it will not drip but also does not go a long way for someone with medium to long hair. I used two boxes (could’ve used three) with thick collar bone length hair. The smell is insanely strong and I usually don’t mind strong scents I tend to enjoy them. But this scent caused my eyes to burn and water. With that being said; usually every bleach product smells and causes the same thing. Overall it got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Did the job wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I used this to bleach the ends of my sister’s dark brown hair and it worked great. She took great care to deeply condition her hair several times over two weeks before we applied it and she had little to no damage afterwards. I was concerned that applying permanent fuchsia color immediately afterwards was going to cause some damage but it didn’t, thankfully. Keep in my mind that my sis has never put bleach in her hair and generally only dyes it about once every 3-4 months to cover a few greys. Her hair is also very thick and course.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use I had dark brown hair and wanted to go a reddish color. Obviously this is a strong bleach chemical. My hair had no type of lightening before hand. If it did I’m sure it would fall out like some previous people who are re bleaching there hair over and over and then blame the product. I used the bleach kit and one of there colors on top to get the color I liked. Easy and cheaper than the salon.
customer_reviews.author: bettyboop009

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach + vegan and cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: In my experience, this bleach has the best lift out of any I have ever tried, and I have always accomplished this without damaging my hair. I have been doing my own hair for about 15 years, and I tried a lot of different products before I learned about the cruelty of animal testing. I was worried it would be hard to find a good bleach that was CF because I had come across plenty that were not so great. This is the very best one I have ever tried though, and I love that manic panic is vegan and cruelty free (not tested on animals).
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: This one is a keeper for me
customer_reviews.text: Truly best one to use for bleaching. This brand was the only brand that didn't show too much damage on my hair while other brands have very distinctive left over damage that shows. It did work very well for bleaching.
customer_reviews.author: BearSpirit

customer_reviews.title: And it's not like you can return it
customer_reviews.text: This barely changed my color. Left it on for the told to time, and it just gave a tiny lighter color. On my daughter's hair, it didn't even change at all. And it's not like you can return it.
customer_reviews.author: CWilkinson

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 WOULD RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bleached my hair many times in the past and the product I would use wasn’t the best. It was frustrating! I have dark brown hair and I wanted to go blonde again. I saw this product and decided to give it a try. I was very hesitant because of the reviews below but I do not regret my purchase. It lightened my hair evenly and perfectly! Will purchase again soon.
customer_reviews.author: KAITXO

customer_reviews.title: Great for my super fine
customer_reviews.text: Great for my super fine, delicate hair! I've never been able to use bleaching products without horrible results, but this blew me away. My hair is now almost white, when it had been a very dark brown. And it barely changed, I just make sure to liberally use conditioner after washing it. But make sure to get your hair trimmed after you use the bleach, it will leave the ends a little frizzed, but then it's just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty thick hair (medium/dark brown), and this started working before I could cover my entire head. If your hair is more thin or lightweight, I would recommend checking it frequently, but it worked well for me. I’m not real skilled at applying it, so it did wind up covering my scalp quite a bit, but I didn’t get any burns or even lasting dryness, so it’s pretty gentle on skin. I’ve attached photos of the test strip with my natural hair color and the finished result (I probably could have left it on a bit longer, but I plan on buying some toner to take some of the orange tones out).
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: Top of head dyed lighter than ends
customer_reviews.text: Would have been good.... I put the bleach in on my ends first as directions stated. I put the bleach on the top of my head and roots for only 20 minutes. What happened was my roots and top of my head dyed lighter than the ends on my hair.... I looked like a clown !!!! I bleached my dark brown hair, then dyed it rose gold. It looked a lot better after I dyed it rose gold.
customer_reviews.author: Bring.sarah.the.horizon

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It's clumpy and a little hard to apply but well worth it! I went from dyed black (4 years worth) to bleach blonde with 3 of these kits!
customer_reviews.author: John l.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on treated and untreated hair
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my already existing ombre to extend it higher and to get the existing blonde lighter. It worked quite well on my dark brown/almost black hair, and surprisingly did not damage the previously lightened hair as I was expecting. The fact it comes with the gloves, tub and applicator brush was pretty convinent (i also used it to apply a semi permanent colour afterwards). I would definitely use it again in the future, but might also use the 30vol on the lighter parts to reduce the major breakage that will not doubt happen
customer_reviews.author: Kirtie

customer_reviews.title: Great on African hair
customer_reviews.text: Originally we tried bleaching his hair with blonde hair dye and that turned it red. So we decided to find something stronger. Left it on for about 20 mins great results. I do recommend buying a toner to tone down the yellow. But amazing and didn’t seem to dry out and damage his hair too much though we did an overnight hair mask the night before to protect his hair
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: It works well and it will also burn your scalp
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works. I had blond hair for a lot longer than I thought I would. The initial color is great, but it turns orange if you don’t use purple dye/shampoo stuff to counteract it. The application process was horrible. It felt like my scalp was burning off. It itched and stung and was overall a very bad experience. My hair was surprisingly not damaged in any noticeable way, but it was also the first time I ever bleached all of it at once. I would probably still use it if I ever wanted to bleach my hair again (but I highly doubt I will).
customer_reviews.author: Max C.

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach for a budget!
customer_reviews.text: Best at home bleach I’ve used so far! It’s also inexpensive which is a huge plus! After the intail wash, my hair felt back to normal which is a huge plus because I’ve seen people bleach their hair and have it go very wrong. This bleach works fantastically and I recommend it! It actually lightens your hair drastically which I love because my last at-home bleach turned my hair orange. Manic Panic is where it’s it!
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great but..
customer_reviews.text: This did a great job taking my hair from its natural red to blonde (almost, was a bit yellow). A little toner and you can get the color you want in one job. One thing I must warn is to buy two even for short hair if you have medium or long hair buy 3 or 4. I actually ran out of bleach and had to buy more to finish my roots. It works extreamly well and leave you with minimal damage to your hair. It did something no other bleach has been able to do before. I’ve bleached my hair a couple years ago and had to bleach multiple times with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: You probably won’t get to level 10 in 1 session
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and arrived in good condition. As for the product, I use this bleach kit exclusively. It will give you the best impact with less damage than other brands. Warning: if you have thick, dark or color treated hair you will NOT achieve the level 9 or 10 lightness you need to make Manic Panic dye pop in 1 session. Do not leave it on longer than instructions dictate!
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach by far!
customer_reviews.text: This is only from the first round of bleaching. It’s gonna take a couple times to get the orange color blond since I’ve dyed my hair black for so long. But honestly this is the first ever bleach that hasn’t damaged my hair! I shampooed twice and conditioned once. My hair feels soft and completely normal! Not dry and no breakage. I’m honestly amazed because last time I bleached my hair with stuff from Sally’s beauty store almost all my hair broke off and it took YEARS to grow it back. So i recommend this Manic Panic bleach to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Francis

customer_reviews.title: and using a good regular shampoo & conditioner will help keep your hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly to strip the purple and pink I previously had in my hair! If you have longer then ear length hair order 2 boxes of it. Definitely follow the instructions with checking it every 10-15mins as some hair types take longer or short times to process. Taking biotin pill, using leave in conditioners,and using a good regular shampoo & conditioner will help keep your hair soft and from breakage. Easy to use and simple cleanup/throw away after done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Not for people who have box dye currently
customer_reviews.text: Welp I blew out my cuticle using this bleach. YOU SHOULD NEVER USE 40 DEVELOPER IF YOUR HAIR HAS BEEN BOX DYED. I knew better and did it anyway. My hair is fried now and the repair is going to be longer and more expensive than getting it done by a professional. Don’t use this product if you want to keep your hair !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Love

customer_reviews.title: Actually worked!!
customer_reviews.text: This took numerous box dyes & years of henna out of my hair with 1 package. My hair length is to the middle of my back & I didn’t think 1 box was enough but it was. And somehow it didn’t damage my hair at all. My hair is already damaged & I was nervous but used regular conditioner & it was fine. This would have took 3-6hrs & hundreds of dollars at the salon. Very shocked but happy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: Fast working strong hair bleach
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to bleach my fiancé’s hair. His hair is naturally really dark brown. We had very fast results following the techniques of separating his hair into four sections and then doing small portions at a time then wrapping each in foil. Two issues were that we didn’t have enough for the whole head. Strongly suggest getting two kits or just a bigger kit if possible if you are bleaching think/long hair to white. Also he has more sensitive skin and developed a bad bumpy rash/burn on his neck, it went away in an hour or so after rinsing it out and showering though. Over all great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ ALL INSTRUCTIONS.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice kit and got my hair bleached to the color I desired. That being said, PLEASE READ ALL OF THE INSTRUCTIONS AND RESEARCH There are so many people that mess up their hair because they dont know what they're doing and dont take care of it. It's not the products fault! Please dont bleach your hair multiple times in a day and please use a hair mask in the shower after you bleach it!!
customer_reviews.author: chairmc

customer_reviews.title: Nervous be gone
customer_reviews.text: I never bleached my hair and was so nervous as I hear horror stories on bleaching, I want teal steaks so decided to try on my own I have white hairs coming in too so was hoping to lighten a level to get the teal in, I left for about 20 or so as I was still checking and i almost heard it work and felt a tiny bit warm I will definitely buy this again as I’m more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ADRIANA R 💜

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product worked extremely well for bleaching the lace on a unit. Bleached fast as I only left the application on the lace for about 15 minutes. Only wanted a slight lift. It did come with the application brush and gloves which was convenient.. My only thing is (which is not an issue), it's pricey to me for just one application. I definitely paid for the convenience, but I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Sharae Wynn

customer_reviews.title: The contents of this product is in question.
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the original order, I purchased a new product. I got a clearly opened and taped box. I have no idea what is in the cream developer bottle because the seal is missing. The bleaching powder is sealed. Tell me what to do ASAP. If Amazon or the supplier gives me assurances that it is okay to use this product, I will.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the bleach powder chunky(making it impossible to get a creamy texture) but upon delivery it seemed to be missing the pair of gloves out of the kit, a very vital piece. I went ahead and tried mixing my kit and to no success I ended up with a lotion-ey chunky mixture that didn't even smell strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole doucette

customer_reviews.title: Works Like It Should
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my wife's hair, and it worked great. We have used a number of other products, generally the ones that come with the hair dye, and they are often more difficult to apply and do not work quite as well for achieving consistent, uniform results. We have finally stopped trying and now purchase this bleach with each new color application.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lift past red .....
customer_reviews.text: My hair is really easy to lift even though it’s dark brown, usually 20 volume peroxide does it ... I usually use fashion frost but didn’t want a huge tub so I got this. Left on an hour and it didn’t lighten past red ... I even tried to use a dryer to heat it up ... used a ton of product per strand... it was soaked and still won’t lighten ... don’t recommend , won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Barger

customer_reviews.title: Easy fast reliable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used this kit nothing else when I want to strip any kind of funky color from my hair it brings it to almost white and super easy to drop fresh dye in when I’m done Also ignore the negative ass people on here ! They did not use the product correctly ! I went to beauty school the only reason they would have issues is if they over processed and did not do strand tests ! Please read the directions very carefully or you will end up like one of those idiots !
customer_reviews.author: Murtie ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and professionals alike
customer_reviews.text: 1) The smell is as expected, chemically but not horribly strong 2) Works quickly and well, despite leaving brassy tones (purple shampoo fixes it) 3) It does dehydrate your hair and does damage it, so use in moderation 4)Comes with nearly all the things one would need 5) It's difficult to save the remaining mixture, so it's a bit of a waste
customer_reviews.author: Kate Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is insane. It starts working the moment it's applied. In fact, I was too slow applying it and had to rinse and have another go in a few spots. I was fully bleached from a darker dishwater blonde to platinum within ten minutes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Lightest Level for At Home Hair Bleach on Dark Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very dark black hair so home bleaching does not get my hair very light. I have used other bleaches like the L'Oreal true blue bleach which one bleaching session gets my hair to a light orange at best. This Manic Panic bleaching set is great because 1) everything you need comes with it including the developer (most places you have to buy it separately) 2) it lightened my hair to a yellow (which is quite difficult for black hair) 3) it was enough product for all of my hair, I have medium length hair.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Drepaul

customer_reviews.title: Leaked, by OK
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my greying light brown hair. I do use the 40 volume for greater let ft. One thing, the box was undamaged, but the developer had leaked all through the package. Bleach envelope owas intact, so no harm done, I guess. But I don't think the manufacturer really packages this product for shipping like this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: works wonders for darker hair.
customer_reviews.text: works super well and even after letting it sit for an hour and a few minutes ( with continued checking) not really any hair fall out!
customer_reviews.author: courtney jones

customer_reviews.title: Very small amount of product. **UPDATE**
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if you're only trying to bleach a small amount of hair. I should have looked at how much product this contained, before wasting $10. Can't even bleach your bangs with the amount provided. Product itself is alright, but the amount this box comes with is hardly enough for even a few highlights. Item can't be returned either. **UPDATE** Tried this item again, arrived combusted from the delivery process.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Exploding bottle and poor results
customer_reviews.text: I love manic panic products and have used this product in the past with no incident. When I opened the bottle it started spraying out like a soda. I got most of it in the bowl so I used it anyways. I left it on for 25 minutes and rinsed it out. The product did not give the same results as I had in the past. I don’t know if it’s reject or just the transit but I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle p.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my touch up!
customer_reviews.text: This little tub was perfect for my regrowth touch up. If your hair is any longer than a pixie you will definitely need to two or more of these but i have a twa and I just needed to redo my new growth and this worked perfectly. It did turn it brassy but I expected that and since I was dying it pink anyways i didn't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tipp.p

customer_reviews.title: Not much product! Not enough for my bob!
customer_reviews.text: There is not a lot of product in here for your money. I like how it’s a kit, but i ran out of bleach 2/3 of the way through dyeing my bob, and my hair doesn’t even reach my shoulders. now i have to wear my hair half bleached until i get more. big L. they should make it clearer how much hair you can dye with it, especially since it’s a kit that’s marketed towards beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product for short to medium hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing I’ve used it multiple times if you are going to buy It’s perfect for short hair but you might need two for super long hair as long as your hairs not severely damaged and you look and follow the directions your hair will not fall out it works very well and washed out easily and was easy to apply I had dyed hair before using it and it took it right out I had blue purple and pink hair the one with the red flower crown was the after product I felt it worked very well I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Shard

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED OPEN AND SPILLED IN BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of time I had to wait for this product I was super pissed that the item came opened and the product was spilled all throughout the box. waste of money!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D.P.

customer_reviews.title: Get product just buy like 2 or 3 boxes, ok no, buy 4 boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Great bleach!!! Worked like bleach is supposed to. My only recommendation is, if you think you need 1 box - get 3 or 4! I read someone else’s review about getting more than you thought so I purchased two boxes and ran out towards the top of my head!! I know scary!!! I don’t want anyone else to experience the panic I went through trying to reuse the bleach from my button foils for my top hair like I did. Other than that, purchase away!!
customer_reviews.author: Carina Carina

customer_reviews.title: Fast, good product but need more than one box
customer_reviews.text: It is a great bleaching product. My teen has thick black hair and it bleached it to gold. It also didn't leave the hair as dried as other products do. It did take appox an hour but that was because there isn't a lot of bleach in the kit and I had to spread it out more than I should have. I have deducted one star for the fact that there isn't a lot of bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No joke!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff bleaches your hair quickly, if it's untreated/virgin hair. I was very surprised that after one application my whole head went from dark brown to highlighter yellow. Definitely recommend this for the bulk of your bleach, with another application of 20 volume bleach for whatever's left.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I have always been warned about bleaching at home, especially using 40 volume developer. I was happy I tried for the first time using this kit. It's easy to use, easy directions and everything you need is included. The smell is not harsh, so the process is pleasant. I was able to leave it on for 35 minutes and lift from a Level 6/7 brassy blonde, to a level 9/10 blonde. My hair feels slightly drier, but not brittle and it still has plenty of shine. If you have thick or longer hair, I would recommend getting 2 boxes. Also, wash with purple shampoo when rising to fight brassy tones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Messy Manic Panic
customer_reviews.text: They literally sent me a box that was already busted. When i opened my packaged and grabbed the box, the side was soft and i immediately knew that something was opened. And i was right! I opened the Manic Panic box to find the 40 volume cream opened and busted.. a waste of product. When i was rinsing it off, the cap was slightly loose too. First time purchasing this product .. disappointed with the packaged received. It was a complete mess. Even the inside of the box was coming apart because of the mess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use the product, cant return it either..
customer_reviews.text: I have no use for the product as I purchased two, and have no use for this one. The problem i have is not with the product, but the fact i cant return it. I can't use it and i cant return it, so I'm out about $11.... Make sure you need it when you buy it, cuz you're stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the 40 vol. developer because i had a. 30 vol. one already & didn’t want to damage my hair too much. But kit IS complete and works perfectly. Brush is pretty small not standard size but still gets job done. You may need more than one kit if you have really long hair or really thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Bleaches super dark hair fast!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING BLEACH KIT!!! I have very dark brown hair and it usually takes me a few bleach applications to get to blonde. This stuff works on the first try!! I didn't think there was enough of it for all of my hair but I had more than enough with this little kit. I recommend getting a purple shampoo afterwards to tone down the orange though :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Morgan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 if you have A LOT OF HAIR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked was not buying two of these due to the fact I have thick hair. Although besides making that mistake I love this, as someone who bleached their hair for the first time it was easy to use and definitely worth the money. If you have a lot of hair I suggest buying 2!!!! The product is hand sized basically, it’s small but powerful. I am waiting for my second box to ship now so I can finish my hair. ( My dyed hair before shown in the pic was red )
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny amount of bleach.
customer_reviews.text: I have medium length hair and this was only enough bleach for half of my head. I had to stop half way through and go to the store the next day to buy more bleach. It was enough for chin length hair. I would’ve needed at least 2.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Does not lighten as hoped
customer_reviews.text: We used this on 3 different persons. None came out very light at all. We had to watch it close because it smelled hot and left the hair super brittle. We did not leave on the full amount, cut it short by 5-6mins because the hair already felt like straw and was make little to no change.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my best friend as a gift. She loved it, she said the product wasnt abrasive as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Pita

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried my hair would fall out being that it comes with a 40 developer but it actually turned out how I wanted it. I did end up using a toner 2 days later and it worked out great by blending my already white hairs into a soft blond. I used a cap as well for a all over highlight so I did not bleach my whole head.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works like it should. I would personally get the 2 pack if you are bleaching most/all of your hair just in case you run out. Since my hair wasn’t virgin when I bleached it, I had to leave it in a bit longer which is normal for all bleaches. Remember to use a toner too;)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One box is a joke
customer_reviews.text: You need to buy at least 3 boxes for a normal head of shoulder length hair. Finding this out while bleaching is no fun. Also, their packaging is not recyclable. For these 2 reasons I will not buy any more Manic Panic products.
customer_reviews.author: texas girl makes good

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair
customer_reviews.text: Didn't dry it or messed it up do recommend. I went from dark brown hair to blonde orange got good compliments from strangers.
customer_reviews.author: S.&D.

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure To Have Enough!
customer_reviews.text: So, definitely my fault that I didn’t buy another box. We realized halfway through, that it wouldn’t make it. So part of my hair is still brown, while the rest is a fabulous blond! I will definitely buy this again(2 boxes this time!) when I do my hair again! I love how easy it is!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: This is an edit to my previous review. Although the gloves and shower cap were missing, the kit itself worked great. I just used my own stuff. It did a fantastic job of lightning my hair so that I can dye it purple and it actually look purple.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bleach
customer_reviews.text: Way too thick. Doesn’t blend good at all, leaves clumps and takes forever to work then it bleaches to a orange color, I have light brown hair and this damaged my hair really bad. It wasn’t enough for half of my head and I have shoulder length hair
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Expired developer, old stock?
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the box was opened and the seal broken I noticed the developer bottle was bubbled out. As soon as I turned the cap, air hissed out. The developer was expired. So either the item was not properly stored, or they're old stock. I ended up using my own 20 volume Wella developer and was lifted to the right level in 15 minutes. At least the bleach powder still worked! Buyer beware though, I suggest you spend your money at Sally's when they come back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This kit works great! It came with everything needed to bleach, even a tint brush which made the application much easier and precise. My hair is very dark brown, and it lifted to a pale yellow color in 90 minutes. I would recommend it for anyone who is not necessarily a professional
customer_reviews.author: Fromalonelystar

customer_reviews.title: Works better with lighter hair
customer_reviews.text: I rebleached my hair after doing so two days prior because the color didn’t really lift the first time (I know, really not good for your hair, but i’m impatient.) I have thick, dark-brown hair, but I figured that enough color had lifted the first time that this time I would get my desired look. It did lift it a lot more (brassy-golden) but didn’t get up to where I wanted. I don’t blame the product as much though because my hair is so dark, so if you have lighter hair this should work great for you!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and well!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! This is always my go to for hair bleach! I love this stuff, it works very quickly and does the job well! Note: the gloves and shower cap are INSIDE the mixing tub when you open it. I thought mine wasn't included until I opened up the tub. Nothing was missing!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Allen

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing performance
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably effective! I have very dark hair and have never successfully lightened my hair enough for bright colors at home before using this. Needed to use it twice to get the shade I wanted, but that's to be expected if you want to go from dark almost black hair to bright blue, green, and purple. After two rounds with this stuff and then violet toner, my colors are eye wateringly vibrant. Easy to use, comes with a free brush I then used for dyeing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nony Mous

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and opened
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice until a month after receiving this product. The box was already open and had a tampered tape on it saying it was an opened product. Most items inside were missing. Couldn't get money back since I noticed after the month time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Nw.Reader

customer_reviews.title: My hair was so soft after using it.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe it. I was sure the soft would rinse away, but it didn’t. This is by far the best at home bleach kit I’ve ever used. It lightened my naturally dark hair better than I’ve seen at some salons. My hair was a long pixie-cut and we had more than enough left over. If you have thick or hair that’s longer than chin-length, order more than 1.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!!!:(
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. It has left my hair orange and in very bad condition. I do not recommend it. Do not buy it. See my photos.
customer_reviews.author: zeta violeta

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. I love this bleach
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I love this bleach. However the downside is that I needed to buy a total of 3 to bleach all of my hair from black to blonde. It burns like hell!! Be sure to take the necessary precautions when using this bleach. Rub some Vaseline around the edges of your hair, put on a old shirt and/or towel, gloves, etc. Try not to leave it on TOO long because it will burn your skin. If you happen to then just rub some milk on the area that burns. This'll briefly relieve it. This is a very strong bleach! Be sure to buy argan oil or any other recommended oil to treat your hair! Happy bleaching!
customer_reviews.author: Nero

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It made my red hair platinum blonde, which I really like. It's very hard to dye red hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Messenger

customer_reviews.title: first time bleaching my hair by myself
customer_reviews.text: First time bleaching my hair by myself for the first time due to the quarantine. i under estimated how much hair i actually have so after using it i had no problems but i did have to go to walmart just to fix my blotchy mess but it turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Does what is meant to
customer_reviews.text: If you need to bleach your hair this is the stuff to use. My hair is black and I bleach it Platinum. Usually, I get this brownish rust color along one side of my part. Not with this. Hair is perfect. Great stuff. Will buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Worst bleaching kit
customer_reviews.text: Im so upset that I used the last of my money on this. I've used box at home bleaching kits from the dollar store that work way better than this. I've used 2 dollar box bleach that worked better. I literally put this on a ash blonde wig. For over 30 minutes and it literally remained the same. Wtf. I'll never use this bleach again. Do not waste your money on this bleaching kit. It doesnt work. So disappointing. I wish I could get money back!
customer_reviews.author: bedmon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality color!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a light peroxide color but love a white look. I bought this but was pretty nervous to try it. So glad I did! This is way less irritating to my scalp compared to the peroxide to my amazement. Easy to use and left on for 30 minutes. I have found my new haircolor!
customer_reviews.author: Mrmansfield

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Turned out good. Happy with it. Would use again
customer_reviews.author: Ryan PB Feuer

customer_reviews.title: Used it for ombre and its awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bleach, I bought it to do some ombre over my dark brown hair, instead of just bleaching it, i diluted it on shampoo and conditioner to make it less strong, it took about 40 minutes. If in the future I am going to bleach my hair, i would use manic panic. Really happy with the results! And the kit was very nice with the container, gloves, brush...
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Use Product, missing items and wasn't sealed. YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to use the product, which I now know isn't refundable and will just have to throw it out. When I purchase an item like this, ESPECIALLY when it is "prime" eligible, I assume it is new, unused, and complete. This product was obviously opened previously, had no gloves or plastic hair wrap, which are both featured and needed items listed in the application directions. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Toni green

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: There is only enough for MAYBE highlights. We bought this to lighten my daughter's hair before dying it blue. She's barely 11 so small head and just longer than chin length hair. There wasn't enough to finish her entire head!!
customer_reviews.author: April Laue

customer_reviews.title: Two toned head but kinda like the look
customer_reviews.text: Ive used many bleaching products and this one i didnt like so much. I colored my hair and it was very uneven. My sides and the back of my head took the color i wanted but not the top. Ive colored it twice of the same color and still didnt take.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Works great but highly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Only bit of Manic panic that actually did its job. Bleached the hair from 5 to a 9. The toner from them didn't get me the rest of the way to white though. Hair is highly dry after but no breakage and recovering. Just makes it so I use conditioner more often .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Contents were spilled on the inside. No option to replace being that it is a chemical. Threw it out, will just to into the store tomorrow and purchase a lightener. 13 bucks wasted... pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: ItsTrixie2You

customer_reviews.title: I Always Use This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I always use this stuff when I need to rebleach my hair. I've been doing bright colors on my hair for years (blue, purple, green, pink, red..) and I use this before I do a new color to get my hair a light blonde and all one tone. It does what it's supposed to do, lightens you hair a significant amount in a short time. It's a great value for your money & if you have longer hair like me, I recommend getting 2 kits. Just be sure to follow the directions so you don't over-process your hair.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quick!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. I bought 2 and should have bought 3 for my hair length. (2 1/2-3 inches past Shoulders). So buy more than you think you’ll need! Very quick and easy. Came with brush, cap, and gloves as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Effective but super yellow
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I legit just parted my hair and rubbed this stuff in until my hair was fully saturated. I used two boxes would have used a third if I could have. Only complaint is the yellow. I’m toning it down now with purple shampoo and maybe a silver dye kit.
customer_reviews.author: sh

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on Hair.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to bleach both of my sons hair. 10 and 14. This product worked perfectly for them both. Easy to use, cost efficient and neither of my sons had and negative effects from it.
customer_reviews.author: lovinglife

customer_reviews.title: Gloves and cap not included!
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, but the instructions warn to be sure to use the "enclosed" gloves and strongly recommend wearing the "enclosed" plastic cap during processing. The box actually contains neither item, so factor in the cost of buying them separately when deciding whether to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Heard

customer_reviews.title: I was promised the strongest bleach I can find, and I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have dark hair, and I wanted to try blonde for a year or two, so I NEEDED to bleach, and bleach hard, so I landed on this, and I can legit thank this product for the utterly fantastic results, it has changed my online and real-life presence.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse David

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to do my daughter's tips for a dual tone metallic purple dye. Foiled the tips and they turned out great! Her hair is not fried (thick and dark so had to sit for a bit). I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: KB

product_meta.title: Manic Panic Flash Lightning Hair Bleach Kit - 40 Volume Cream Developer - Hair Lightener Kit for Light, Medium Or Dark Brown & Black Hair Color - Hair Bleach Powder Lifts up to 7 Levels of Lightening
feature_bullets: 40 VOLUME CREAM DEVELOPER - This hair bleaching kit lifts hair up to seven levels. A premium hair lightener, this kit prepares your mane for intense Manic Panic hair dye colors.

DUST-FREE BLEACH POWDER - The dust-free bleach powder helps to gently prepare hair for intense vivid colors during the lightening process. This hair bleaching kit ensures the hair lifts evenly for results you’ll love.

HAIR BLEACH KIT INCLUDES: One dust-free bleach powder, one 40 volume cream developer, one mixing tub, one tint brush, one plastic cap, one set of plastic gloves, and instructions for use. PLEASE NOTE: Gloves & Cap are inside the mixing tub.
CRUELTY FREE, VEGAN FORMULA – This bleaching kit features vegan ingredients tested on celebrities, not animals. This bleach kit is vegan, cruelty free and PETA accredited.
INTENDED USE - This Hair Bleach Powder & 40 Volume Cream Developer is intended for natural medium brown, dark brown, & black hair color to achieve medium blonde to very light blonde results.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
